bibdata.abstract: Guidance for engineering, implementation, and management of System Integrity Protection Schemes (SIPS) is provided in this guide. General concepts for architecture and communication design to achieve functionality and performance requirements are addressed.Principles for commissioning processes and strategies for life-cycle management are also discussed.
